title: Tuxedo Recipe
full_text:
Tuxedo Recipe
Close
Jump to recipe
Prep
5 mins
Total
5 mins
Serves
1 cocktail
Cook Mode
(Keep screen awake)
Ingredients
2
ounces
gin
(Plymouth works very well in this drink)
1
ounce
fino sherry
1
dash
orange bitters
Directions
Pour all ingredients into a mixing glass; fill with ice, and stir briskly for 30 seconds. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.
Gin
Liqueurs & Fortified Wines
